snippet.title: Kitaria Fables - Announcement Trailer | Action RPG & Farming Sim | Coming to PC and Consoles in 2021
snippet.description:
WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF CANOIDERA

Canoidera is a peaceful land where nature lives in harmony - until now.
Armed with sword, bow and spellbook, fight against a rising darkness threatening the world. Plunder dungeons in search of relics and resources, tend to your farm to make provisions and potions, and take on quests solo, or with a friend!

Find out more:
http://pqube.co.uk/kitaria-fables 
Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1356280/Kitaria_Fables
